productName: Gucci GG Jacquard Track Jacket Blue

productInfo.details: A defining fabric of the latest collections seen throughout ready-to-wear and accessories, GG wool is reworked into a straight-cut coat, with contrast trims and patent leather buttons to add a retro-inspired feel. The Cruise 2020 fashion show sets the stage for a contemporary aesthetic, blending streamlined shapes and distinguished materials that speak to the House's heritage.

Designed with an oversize fit, this piece features the white and red Gucci Blade print—a recurring motif of this season. A slightly heavier quality of cotton jersey defines the T-shirts for Spring Summer 2019, resulting in an enhanced retro appearance.;Black cotton jersey;White and red Gucci Blade print;Crewneck;Oversize fit;100% cotton;Made in Italy.

Debuted on the Fall Winter 2019 runway, this overshirt is presented in a paper effect woven fabric, treated for a wrinkled finish. Enriched with gold-coloured foil, a naturalistic motif animates the silhouette. The sportswear and outerwear worlds collide in this new style – the distinctive features of a bowling shirt are transformed into an exaggerated design that can be worn as a maxi shirt or a jacket, resulting in a contemporary layering game of motifs and fabrics.;Flowers, birds and Interlocking G print with gold-coloured foil on light blue wrinkled paper effect fabric;Patch pockets;Mother of pearl buttons;Oversize fit;100% polyethylene;Made in Italy.

Crafted from fine dots patterned blue wool, these pants combine sartorial excellence and an eclectic vision. The result of expert workmanship, the silhouette is specially constructed for an ideal fit and drape. A highly refined sartorial detail, the design is completed by an interior viscose silk belt. Blue and beige fine dots pattern wool. Red piping. Horn buttons. Viscose lining. Interior sartorial viscose silk belt. Elastic side details at the waistband. Front slash pockets. Button-through back besom pockets. Hook and zip closure. 16.5 leg opening, based on a size 46 (IT). 100% wool. Made in Italy.

For Spring Summer 2019, Gucci tracksuits, like this pair of loose jogging pants, are crafted in cotton chenille. A sporty play on a traditional House code, the felt Interlocking G patch decorates the back. Influences drawn from the sportswear and leisurewear worlds collide into an inherently Gucci style juxtaposing athletic inspired shapes with soft, refined fabrics. Black cotton chenille; Red, blue and yellow stripe down the sides; Interlocking G patch on the back; Elastic waistband with drawstring; Front pockets; Back button-through pocket; Elastic detail at the leg opening; Loose fit; 85% cotton and 15% polyamide; Made in Italy

A gabardine pant featuring the bee-one of Gucci's most distinctive symbols, taken from the 70s archives. The preppy influence, a style that can be traced back to the Ivy League schools in the Northeast United States, continues to characterize the Gucci narrative. For Pre-Fall 2018, the concept transcends the original lifestyle and is now identified by House codes and androgynous silhouettes. Dark blue wool gabardine with red silk bees. Bordeaux piping. Elastic waistband with drawstring. Front slash pockets. Back flap pockets. 15 leg opening. 100% wool. Made in Italy. The model is 6'2 and is wearing a size 46.

productName: ivory Rhyton Gucci logo leather sneaker

productInfo.details: Designed with a thick sole and bulky construction, the sneaker has a retro influence in leather with a vintage Gucci logo inspired by prints from the 1980s. Ivory leather with Gucci vintage logo. Gucci logo tag. Rubber sole. 10mm height. Made in Italy.

Among the distinctive accessories of the Maison, the Ace sneaker is enriched with vintage GG printed in green and red. Steeped in influences from different decades, the Gucci shoes collection revisits shapes and logos inspired by vintage sports fashion. White leather. Printed buckle with green and red GG detail. Detail in red metallic leather on the back of one of the two shoes and detail in green metallic leather on the back of the other. Rubber sole. Height 25 mm. Made in Italy.

Crafted from bicolor black and butter leather, the men's loafer blends the classic shape with distinctive House codes. The green and red Web stripe—a nod to the House's equestrian roots—is combined with a new Horsebit hardware that incorporates the Interlocking G detail at the center. Black and white leather. Green and red Web trim. GG buckle. Leather sole. Heel height: 35 mm. Made in Italy.

Balenciaga combines Parisian refinement with a streetwear edge to create directional silhouettes that are coveted by the sartorial crowd the world over. This black cotton coat takes a new approach to tailored styles, found throughout the oversized structured shoulders and long-length sleeves.

Famous for bold logo prints, fluorescent hues and chunky Dad trainers, Balenciaga takes a more refined approach the AW19 collection and incorporates more subtle signature style prints, paying more attention to wardrobe staples and tailored classics. Crafted from white cotton, this S/s Normal T-shirt features a round neck, short sleeves, a central printed logo and a straight fit.

Logo-loving Balenciaga is good at making itself known. This bright red cotton ski sweater is printed with the designer name, Parisian address and signature BB logo on the front. In case you get lost on the slopes. Featuring a high standing collar, a front zip fastening, long sleeves, fitted cuffs, an oversized fit, an address print and contrasting stripes at the hem.

The Spanish fashion house of Balenciaga offers cutting-edge styles that balance clean, modern silhouettes with strong shapes and innovation with refinement. Crafted from dark blue cotton, these classic cargo pants feature a waistband with belt loops, side pockets, front flap pockets and a straight leg.

The Spanish fashion house of Balenciaga offers cutting edge styles that balance clean, modern silhouettes with strong shapes and innovation with refinement, as seen in these black Stripe tracksuit pants. Featuring an elasticated waistband, zipped side pockets, a straight leg and multicoloured striped details to the sides with Balenciaga logos.

The Spanish fashion house of Balenciaga offers cutting-edge styles that balance clean, modern silhouettes with strong shapes and innovation with refinement. These fitted jeans are crafted from dark blue stretch denim with slightly distressed edges. Featuring a waistband with belt loops, a five pocket design, whiskering at the thigh, a slim fit and a distressed finish.

Famous for bold logo prints, fluorescent hues and chunky Dad trainers, Balenciaga takes a more refined approach for the AW19 collection and incorporates more subtle signature style logos, paying more attention to wardrobe staples and tailored classics, as showcased by these multicoloured Track.2 low-top sneakers. Featuring a lace-up front fastening, a logo patch at the tongue, branded heel counter, a pull tab at the rear, a panelled colour block design and a chunky rubber sole.

Take on Balenciaga's ‘Modern glamour’ with ‘neo-tailoring’ shirt jackets and matching trousers as well as sweat-dresses with exaggerated power shoulders. Carrying on the futuristic feel of oversized proportions are these grey, green and white leather Triple S sneakers. Featuring an almond toe, a lace-up front fastening, branded heel counter, a pull tab on the tongue and on the rear, a side logo stamp and a layered chunky rubber sole.

Playing to the extremes, Balenciaga's new season made use of contrasting black against vibrant and fluorescent hues. An iconic design in contemporary footwear, these Speed sneakers feature a sock-like upper with a ribbed hem that sits atop a chunky rubber sole. Featuring a high ankle, a knitted style and a logo to the outside.

Fashioning sophisticated and simple designs such as the little black dress, and introducing the use of comfortable and affordable fabrics, the French house founded by Coco Chanel has been a mark in the haute couture and ready-to-wear industry for over a hundred years. Fashioned in 2008, Karl Lagerfeld introduces a slim silhouette to this Sports Line collection. The rich design was crafted from pure black wool, with the subtle detail of a branded upper arm. It also features a high standing collar, a front zip fastening, long sleeves with zipped cuffs, four topped front pockets, a straight hem and ribbed details. Please note that pre-owned items are not new and therefore might have minor imperfections.

Grey cashmere-mohair-wool blend Dallas jumper from Chanel Pre-Owned featuring a ribbed crew neck, long sleeves, ribbed cuffs, a straight hem, a ribbed hem, an intarsia knit and embossed metal star appliquées.

Delve into the collection of the legendary Chanel to discover the supreme quality, style and beauty upheld by this timeless fashion house. Made from white, black and beige leather and nylon, these 2010 paneled boots fasten with a lace-up front. Featuring a round toe, a rear zip fastening and a ridged rubber sole. Please note that pre-owned items are not new and therefore might have minor imperfections.

productName: Nike x Gyakusou colour block sports jacket

productInfo.details: Why wait until the last minute to get yourself beach body ready? Get back on track with this yellow colour block sports jacket from a collaborative effort between Gyakusou and Nike that gives you pockets at the front and back to store a skipping rope, energy bars and whatever else needed to reach your goal. Sweat it out now so you can lie down later. Featuring a printed logo to the front, a patch pocket at the chest, a print to the rear, a back zip pocket, a front zip fastening, an elasticated hem, panelled long sleeves and concealed zipped hoodie.

For those who didn't know, Nike has an ACG collection which stands for ‘All Conditions Gear.’ Expect innovative athletic apparel and sportswear for every climate. This white NRG ACG 2.5L packable windbreaker jacket from Nike features a drawstring toggle hood, long sleeves, elasticated cuffs, a front zip fastening, a purple pocket with zip fastening, a purple panel to the back and an elasticated hem.

Originally designed for skateboarders, Vans embraces the carefree lifestyle of southern California…as should you. Celebrate the comfort and ease of the new generation. These orange and white canvas and leather Comfycush Era sneakers from Vans feature a round toe, a lace-up front fastening, a branded insole, a tropical motif pattern design and a flat rubber sole.

productName: Vans OG Old Skool colour-block sneakers

productInfo.details: Vans' 'OG Old Skool' sneakers are exactly what their name suggests . Designed to resemble the brand's vintage styles, they're punctuated with green, yellow and red panels against a pristine white background. You'll be too cool for school wearing these. Featuring a lace-up front and rubber soles.

Originally designed for skateboarders, Vans embraces the carefree lifestyle of southern California…as should you. Celebrate the comfort and ease of the new generation. Crafted from suede and canvas, these black OG Skool 36 sneakers from Vans feature a lace-up front fastening, a round toe, a contrasting white stripe to the side, contrast stitching and a flat white rubber sole.
Yellow flat lace-up sneakers from Vans featuring a round toe, a lace-up front fastening, a branded insole and a white rubber sole.
